page.title: 14SOCIAL SURVEY
page.content: From our social survey we found that a lot of people would like a by-pass.A by-pass would take a lot of the heavy traffic out of the main street(see page 15) A lot of people would like to see more shops in West Calder such as clothes shops,toy shops,freezer shops, shoe shops and a stationer. The average time people have lived in this area is 13 years. Quite a lot of people use the library.Over 50% use the bus service but out of the people we interviewed hardly anyone ever used the train service. It seems that people in this area dont think there is enough facilities for the young to use.So they said they wanted a leisure centre ,tennis courts and more playgrounds for young children.
